channel.title: Articles on FOSS Scouting
channel.description: Recent content in Articles on FOSS Scouting

item.title: The Patrol Method as a Model for Distributed Cognition
item.description: A patrol is more than just a group of Scouts; it’s a cognitive system. We explore how the Patrol Method leverages the power of distributed cognition to solve complex problems.

item.title: Knot Tying, Muscle Memory, and Procedural Knowledge
item.description: Why does practicing a knot until you can tie it in the dark work so well? We dive into the cognitive science of procedural memory.
